metadata.title: CVE-2021-44506 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). A lack of input validation in calls to do_verify insr_unix/do_verify.c allows attackers to attempt to jump to a NULL pointerby corrupting a function pointer.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
